messages.message: Just letting you know I'm back in Flagstaff.  I hope this gets through to you in Mexico.  If not, it'll probably kick in when you get close to the border.  Expect long lines at the border crossing, I had to wait an hour and a half.

Hello,

I won't be able to make it this time, I have a prior engagement in South Arizona.  I look forward to attending the next time.

-RJ

I'm saving up for a move to the Phoenix area (ironically) so I think I'll have to pass this time around.  Tell everyone I said hi.

-RJ
